history.content:
All 100-190 courses can.  (Note: I think this is probably true but am uncertain if C100 -- the new upper div data science course -- has been looked at in this regard.)

197/198/199 cannot.

All grad courses need to be petitioned to fulfill the requirement. Shoot me an email and I'll send you the petition. 

Almost all 194's can -- every once in a while a 194 is created that isn't as technical or field-specific so you should check with an advisor to confirm but 95% of them will work.

All 100-190 courses can.

197/198/199 cannot.

All grad courses need to be petitioned to fulfill the requirement. Shoot me an email and I'll send you the petition.

Can all CS upper div and graduate classes be counted to fill the upper division EECS requirement or are there any restrictions? Specifically I was looking at CS294 - I remember reading somewhere that for certain offerings of the class, it would only be an engineering upper div but not a EECS upper div.
history.subject: Upper Division EECS Classes
